EmailTemplate.name: HFS Request from Brand
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Hands Free Shopping Request has been received ref@ {!HFS_Item__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Village_Presence__c.Brand__c},
Your request for Hands Free Shopping has been received. You will receive an email when a runner is on their way
Customer: {!HFS_Experience__c.Customer_Name__c} Customer Number: {!HFS_Experience__c.Name}
Thank you very much for using this service.
Regards, Bicester Visitor Centre
